title: Come On Now, Even If I’m Not A Villain
summary: After being killed by her own father, I woke up... 500 years later?! To make things worse, I’ve been reborn into the body of a so-called villainess—a woman hated by her family and fiancé for her fragile health and sharp temper. All I wanted was to live quietly and figure out why I was reincarnated. But now, my once-cold family and fiancé are suddenly desperate for my attention, and my slave boy from 500 years ago has returned... perfectly alive. As if that wasn’t enough, immortal weapons from ancient times are starting to gather around me. "You shouldn’t have fed the stray dog." I never gave anyone a single bite, so why is this happening?!

title: What a Bountiful Harvest, Demon Lord!
summary: Who was that guy that once said, “***An army marches on its stomach**”? When hapless agricultural science student *Jangcheol Kim* starts playing the fantasy MMORPG “**Paladins of Blood**” to escape the stress of school life, he never imagined he would end up inside the game, much less as its final boss. How can a ruthless demon overlord win over his subjects? Perhaps with potatoes.

title: Whispers of the Devil
summary:
He killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the "baby of fate"...

Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the devil beast king. Angered by the 13 heroes' attempt to take his life, he had decided to bring ruin upon humanity, but he gets entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby. Is this the tale of a world close to apocalypse or a diary of new-era childcare?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000841)

title: Became a Black Flower
summary:
This is a story about a black cat who became a cat girl.

---

Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/M_terU116/status/1816775907320955112)

title: The Cold-Blooded Warrior
summary:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…

title: The Strongest Hero with Negative Destructive Power
summary:
Decades have passed since the world became flooded with monsters. The protagonist, who enrolled in an academy to train those with aptitude, consistently ranked last in ability tests. It would have been one thing if his abilities were merely low, but because he also inflicted a debuff (ability reduction) on his surrounding comrades, he was called “unwanted” and a “burden.”

One day, while exploring, the protagonist is swallowed by a different dimension and goes missing. There, he encounters a creature from another world and is told the true value of his ability. Originally, magical power is something used to attack by projecting one’s own power outwards. However, the protagonist’s characteristic is the complete opposite of this “output”; it is “input” (absorption), and the ability to suck in external power is his true strength… “Reverse Magic Circuit.” The reason he had been debuffing his allies until now was that he had been unknowingly absorbing their power.

Having learned the true worth of his power, the protagonist now absorbs monster attacks to nullify them and gathers external power to strengthen himself, mastering his abilities and proceeding on the path to becoming the strongest.

title: Shut up, Evil Dragon, I don’t want to raise a child with you anymore
summary:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...

title: The Stray Cat Who Doesn’t Know the Greatest Love Song
Please Leave Emily Alone
summary: Emily Addisio, with her acceptance letter in hand, enters the academe, featuring of a happy academy life, but she suddenly gets into an accident. Ethan Valenti, who accidentally helped her, gradationally becomes attracted to Emily, and Emily also feels shocked by his aggressive style. Before Emily could feel a strange sense of relief, he seized the window hedge with his right hand, which reached up to his midriff, and fluently jumped inside the structure. ” What?” In a moment, a dark shadow fell on Emily, who was amazed by the unforeseen narrow distance. That was because Lord Valenti, who is higher than her, was looking at her with his reverse leaning against the window. And as the shadow girdled her, Emily artificially tried to step back. But before she could move, Valenti reached out to snare the handkerchief she was holding.” Thank you, Emily. That was kind of you, but you did not have to return it.” The beautiful romantic story of Emily, which is ordinary but always girdled by extraordinary situations, and Ethan, who gave her his first and last love.

title: I Am Being Chased by My Husband
summary:
Proposed to my lifelong nemesis? A dangerous romance of chasing and deceiving between a scheming woman and a prickly man, based on Yuna Jin's original work. Elise, the Empire's most wanted criminal, dreams of a new life after leaving her dark past behind, only to receive a terminal diagnosis. The only solution is to obtain the "Stone of Time," owned by Duke Johannes—the man who's been chasing her all her life.

Screw it. Can't she just hide her identity?

"Love at first sight, Duke! Marry me!"

Can Elise successfully hide her identity and secure the Stone of Time?

---
My husband is hot on my trail! 

Eloise, a fugitive with a dark past, and Lord Johannes, the temple’s relentless hound, enter a marriage built on lies. With one year to live, Eloise must steal the Stone of Time from Johannes without revealing her identity. Can she survive this deadly game of deception?

title: Bad Born Blood
summary:
Humanity’s home is no longer Earth. Intersellar travel is now a common occurence, and technology has replaced blood and flesh.

Luka, who grew up in the slums, has turned fifteen and taken the selection exams. His aptitude is of the Imperial Guard.

title: Genius Archer’s Streaming
summary:
Former archery prodigy Yoo Sanghyun was destined for greatness until an injury forced him to quit. Though his coach helped him secure a stable job, he never felt like he belonged. Frustrated, he leaves it all behind to pursue game streaming. 

Leveraging his incredible archery skills and the charm of his noob character, he quickly rises to fame as "Almond." Now, he's determined to dominate the gaming world, but will his virtual success translate into something greater in real life?

title: Frozen Warrior
summary:
Cheok Ryugeom, a Goryeo swordsman, threw himself off a cliff holding the enemy for his master's sake.

However, he wakes up in the modern era—900 years later—after being frostbound...

This is the revenge tale of Goryeo's top swordsman in the modern era.

title: The Reincarnated Assassin is a Genius Swordsman
summary:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?

title: A Regressor’s Tale of Cultivation
summary:
Devoid of any talent, I met my end after suffering at rock bottom for many years.

That was my first life... and the start of my endless regressions.

title: Stuck in the Tower
summary: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.

title: Death Penalty
summary:
In the present day, tower dungeons called Magic Towers have appeared throughout the world.

Takamichi Yoshito is a convenience store clerk. The manager yells at him every day, making his life miserable. Yoshito dreams of making a fortune, and soon after the Magic Towers appear. He becomes a Challenger of the towers, but he has no savings to invest in weapons or equipment, leaving him completely late to the game.

Aiming for a quick turnaround, Yoshito sells his real-life savings and the few items he has in the tower, and buys the [Infinite Revival] skill from a shady merchant. This skill allows him to revive himself within the dungeon. However, [Infinite Revival] had a hidden disadvantage.

When reviving, the user is randomly given a [Death Penalty], a permanent debuff so strong that once it is applied, the user is no longer able to work as an adventurer. Yoshito despairs over the cursed skill, but his situation changes drastically when he obtains the rare skill [Inversion] in a hidden room of the dungeon.

The skill [Inversion] reversed the heavy negative effects of [Death Penalty]'s permanent debuff caused by Infinite Revival and turned them all into positive stats!

title: Breakers
summary:
We ended up at a concept bar on a whim for the afterparty, and it turned out to be full of seriously tall women.

It’s a manga where the customers have a casual conversation with the big ladies they meet at the bar.
The conversations mostly revolve around appearances and the relationship dynamics between people.

title: After Rebirth, I Used Mirror Reversal For Vengeance
Calm Down, Lady Ophelia!
summary: The tsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsundere girl getting less and less tsun day by day.

title: The Ugly Wife of the Shady Duke
summary: Reincarnated as the neglected wife of a duke who secretly loves the novel's heroine, she plans to divorce him to survive. Yet, he desperately begs her not to leave, confusing her as the story unfolds differently than she remembered.

title: The Princess is Evil
summary: An 18-year-old young man who lived a peaceful and normal life is murdered by an unknown man. He is reincarnated as an evil little dragon who is the pet of the crown prince of a magical kingdom. He discovers that the prince is actually his reincarnated assassin, and that he has a secret mission to destroy the kingdom. The little dragon will have to face the dangers and intrigues of the royal court, while at the same time trying to get closer to the prince and discover his true feelings. Will he be able to stop the prince's evil plan and find his happy ending?

title: The Wirepuller Gets Lucky in Happier Years
summary: When gifted fortune teller Park Doa dies, she transmigrates into the body of Bunnie, a curse absorber for the daughter of an archduke. As the new Bunnie, she befriends Demian, a boy prophesied to bring ruin to the empire. But when Bunnie reads Demian's fortune, she learns that, actually, he has the potential for greatness and prosperity, so she decides to shape him into the next emperor instead. Will these two be able to defy destiny and rewrite their futures? Or will the curse of fate prevail?

title: Gold Queen
summary: I'm Teru! Just your wee lil' horny high school girl who's trying to become a mangaka! One day, while I was lost in my sexual fantasies, I got hit by a truck and was reincarnated into an isekai! Though I became a slave of the beautiful elf queen, Sirius, I've got a wholesome orc as my roommate, and there's cute elves all around, so I have to say I'm having a pretty time!

title: The Wicked You Sink Into This Love
summary:
Evelyn marries Wilfred to help her sickly sister.

Wilfred is popular in high society and wealthy, but continues to cheat on her even after their marriage. However,
when he returns home, he embraces Evelyn.

"Have you grown tired of me? So why do you make love to me?"

Evelyn is troubled by her relationship with Wilfred. She
thought it was a loveless marriage, but Wilfred's deeper intentions begin to emerge...

The story of a married couple who love each other but deceive each other begins now.

title: From Six to Sovereignty: The Girl Who Ruled
summary: Tracy was only 16 when she was sentenced to death. Unloved and unwanted, she died as a forgotten side character in someone else's story. But fate gives her a chance to write her own story as the protagonist this time by sending her back into her six-year-old body. This time, Tracy knows every betrayal coming her way and refuses to be a mere stepping stone again. If survival means becoming the villain, she'll gladly embrace the darkness. Now, let the real story begin.

title: Part-Time Couple
summary:
Da-In's first love and former lover, Kang Seo-Jun, proposes a 100-day contract marriage to her, saying that if she doesn't get married, she'll die.
Although her pride is slightly hurt by the outrageous offer, Da-In boldly agrees to the terms of the contract, and thus begins her married life with Seo-Jun.

(Source: MangaUpdates)

title: It’s My Destiny To Be The Hero’s Saviour
summary:
I remember the memory of my previous life when I was abused by my father for the experiment. Then I realized. According to my previous life, this is the world of fantasy fiction I’ve read. That she was born with a minor role and died before the novel even started. Ariadne thought calmly, ‘I am screwed.’

She was also screwed on a global basis, this novel has a bad ending. The end of this 10-volume Munchkin (overpowered) fantasy novel is it was the failure of the protagonist and the destruction of the world.

---
After years of torture at the hands of her own father, young elementalist Ariadne Eldier sees her chance to escape when her mother’s untimely death prompts a visit from her grandfather, a powerful archmage. Once whisked away to safety, Aria begins her plans to not only distribute an elixir for the contamination plaguing the land, but also save the protagonist and prevent this novel’s tragic ending. But with her own fated death looming, will Aria be able to become the hero this tale needs?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EA%B3%B5%EC%9D%98-%EA%B5%AC%EC%9B%90%EC%9E%90%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%A0-%EC%9A%B4%EB%AA%85%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2890), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59494826)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-heros-savior/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26301&contentId=301) (App only)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Heros-Savior/597)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112577)

title: The Fake Saint of a Reverse Harem Game
The Archduke’s Gorgeous Wedding Was a Fraud
summary:
I possessed the body of the fourth villainess, Shay, who was miserably killed by the other villains for desperately clinging to the male lead.
However, the male lead suddenly offered me an enormous amount of money, in exchange for a contract marriage to help him escape various romantic advances.

"You have to be the most gorgeous and wicked woman in the empire, so that no one will dare to approach me."

...Isn't this marriage a fraud?
Was what I was going to say, but the amount of money he offered was too tempting to refuse. Alright, before the original female lead appears, I'll show them who's the crazy bitch here.

"Dear customer, I'll do my best to help you!"
 
I was confident this was the original plan, however...
This man, whose affection and warmth know no bounds, said he can't imagine a life without me!

I think I somehow ended up getting money, power and even love!

title: The secrets of the lovely duchess
summary:
A collection of short stories from the pages of Sho-Comi!  
  
Story 1: Side Seat de Daite by Shinjo Mayu  
Mamii is in love with Sawaii, the person everyone considers to be a dork. When she confesses to him, he tells her he has conditions for dating her. What are the conditions? And is Sawaii the person she really thinks he is?  
  
Story 2: Brazen Lovers (3 chapters) by Mio Ayukawa  
Yuuna's mother moves them everytime she breaks up with a boyfriend. This new place is a real dump. Annoyed, Yuuna heads off to the beach where she meets a very sexy guy. Sou says "Lets always be together." but when Yuuna wakes up he's gone! Two people like this are bound to meet again…  
  
Story 3: Feel It, Roast Virgin by Kousaka Yuuka  
Rika is a virgin and is very nervous about her first night with her boyfriend Yuuya. It doesn't help that Yuuya tries to do it everywhere, outside, at school, he's ready! But will Rika be ready?  
  
Story 4: St. Gal Chick Valentine's Day by Ibuki Kaede  
Mika's school has separate buildings for boys and girls and the girls have asked Mika as a student representative to get them co-ed classrooms so they can spend Valentine's Day with school idol, Subaru. Mika vows to try her hardest, even though Subaru annoys her. But maybe he's not such a bad guy.  
  
Story 5: Secret Apple by Toda Megumi  
Sakura Kazuki and Katou Ryu are lovers who have been meeting secretly for two years. Because they were once step siblings, and their parents had a messy divorce, they can't tell anyone. Will they ever be able to love freely?  
  
Story 6: Double Face The Dangerous Classmate by Uchuuda Kai  
It seems Kuroda has been caught in yet another dangerous situation! The boy; whom she considers rudest in her class, Yuuki; has locked the door to the sport supply closet..

title: Solo Max-Level Newbie
summary:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. 

Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower.

title: Time Limited Elixir of the Fallen Sega
summary:
Ryeon knew from the moment she was born that her life was a cursed one. Born sickly in a martial arts family meant she had nothing else to do other than wait for death. And when that icy embrace came, it delivered not peace but a second chance at life! Regressed to her days as a child, Ryeon resolves to cure herself and live a long, healthy life for the sake of herself and her family.

---
After seven years of dormancy, “Ryeon,” the young version of Danmok Ryan who returned after witnessing her death, wakes up. Suddenly, a strange message appears before her: “Keep the life force level below 50. If this condition persists for two months or more, it will lead to death.” Unable to build her abilities, “Ryeon” must rid herself of the life force accumulating in her body. Meanwhile, “Chin Hwa Reonya,” the young future head of the Machin Temple, confronts her, wondering why he serves in her household and is two years younger than her. Additionally, the chicken turns into a hawk, and the cat into a bakho. With a series of unexpected surprises, can “Ryeon” live a happy life in this new existence?

title: Death Is The Only Ending For The Villainess
summary:
Penelope Eckart reincarnated as the adopted daughter of Duke Eckart and the villainess of a reverse harem dating sim. The problem is, she entered the game at its hardest difficulty, and no matter what she does, death awaits her at every ending! Before the "real daughter" of Duke Eckart appears, she must choose one of the male leads and reach a happy ending in order to survive. But the two brothers always pick a fight with her over every little thing, as well as a crazy crown prince, whose routes all lead to death. There's even a magician who's enamoured with the female lead, and a loyal slave knight! But somehow, the favourability meters of the male leads increase the more she crosses the line with them!

This is Penelope’s survival story, who’s been dropped in an insane reverse harem dating sim!

---

**Official English Translations:** [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/villains-are-destined-to-die), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9012), [IzePress](https://yenpress.com/series/villains-are-destined-to-die)
*Tappytoon and Pocket are using the Tapas localization.*

title: I Love the One Who Kills Me
summary:
She is someone with the nickname “Seatmate Killer”, and also one of the prettiest girl in the school. Every male student that became her seatmate has confessed to her, and all of them got rejected brutally. The one who became her new seatmate, the seat being located the furthest away from the front and beside one of the windows, thus being a godly seat that will make every male student jealous, is Narito Yuki. He is someone that generally you won’t notice at all. The entire class thought that he will fall for her in a short time, but that may not be the case……
___
[Alt Official English (Tentai Books)](https://tentaibooks.com/novel-author/aresanzui/)

title: Face Genius, 0-Year-Old Top Star
Tyrant of the Otherworld Prison: My Shadow Can Evolve Infinitely
summary: In the year 2035, rifts to alien realms tore through the world’s defenses. Swarms of insectoids and beastkin ravaged the land, and humanity struggled to survive through the strength of “Evolvers.” Li Yi was betrayed by his teammates during an attack by alien beings and left for dead. On the brink of death, he awakened the “Titan Shadow” System—his shadow could evolve without limits! It could devour ores to enhance defense, tear through enemies to form deadly blades, and even split into an army of shadow soldiers… From insect hives to haunted lands, wherever his shadow passed, enemies were shredded into pulp. This is the revenge of the weak—begun with a shadow that devours all.

title: Sub Male Lead, Come to My Bed
summary:
Oh dear author ㅠㅠ, since the main male lead is for the female lead, I’ll gladly take the sub-male lead.

To all my dear sub-male leads, please come to my bed right now!

A comment I thoughtlessly left as if I had only read a novel, captivated by the sub-male leads.

But apparently, it was not a comment to be taken lightly.

“My instincts tell me, to come to you. To come to your bed.”

Because of that, the sub-male leads in the novel started to become obsessed.

But not with me, with my bed!

“Do not cross this line.”

“I like this bed. Give it to me.”

“I’ve never harbored a single ill thought towards you, not even the size of a fingernail.”

From the crown prince to the mercenary king, even the successor of the wizard tower!

But those who were only interested in my bed started to change.

“You’re too defenseless in front of me.”

“I like you more than the bed.”

“Is it wrong to want to know more about you?”

Just when I thought I had escaped the villainess route, things got more complicated.

…Why is everyone acting like this towards me? I just want to live quietly.

title: The Empress’s Needle
My Wife Appeared at My Wife’s Funeral
Even if the Villain’s Daughter Regresses
summary:
How would you win over an enemy who just won't stop killing you? 

Laila thought she had escaped death by figuring out how to turn back time, but her assassin finds her again... and again... and again! All because her sadistic villain of a father had to murder his entire family... 

When all her evasion plans fail, there's only one option left: coddle her enemy through his childhood and hope he'll spare her when he comes back to exact his revenge. 

But why is this wacko so pigheaded?!

title: I Was Reincarnated as a Baby Fox God
summary:
The princess of the Roachim Empire was killed by her older brother.
Killed, accused of killing their father, the Emperor, she…
 
Kyuaang?
 
…was reincarnated as a divine beast?!
 
An unexpected second life.
But something seems weird?
 
The ruler of the north of the Roachim Empire.
The owner of the Idelbadour Mountains and the Ice Wall.
The Grand Duke of Elharan, whom the Emperor himself cannot approach recklessly…
 
‘My dad, so you mean I’m a divine beast?!’
 
***
 
“My lady…!”
“Please accept these tributes and send down your blessings!”
 
The villagers knelt together at once and prayed earnestly.
While wiggling and not knowing what to do, I heard the sound of laughter in my ear.
 
-Lusha got stronger!
-She’s strong! She’s fresh! She’s thrilling!
-Look at that, even the humans surrendered in the face of Lusha!

The spirits were terribly proud of her, saying that the humans were afraid because of Lusha’s power.
And they lifted her in the air and carried her.
Encompassing her was also a dazzling light that appeared out of nowhere.
Everyone who was praying opened their eyes wide.
 
“It’s the blessing of the Divine Beast!”
“Hooray for the Baby Fox!”
 
Lusha sighed.
 
“Kiiyuu…”

title: The World’s Best Engineer
summary:
When civil engineering student Suho Kim falls asleep reading a fantasy novel, he wakes up as a character in the book.

 Suho is now in the body of Lloyd Frontera, a lazy noble who loves to drink, and whose family is in a mountain of debt. Using his engineering knowledge, Suho designs inventions to avert the terrible future that lies in wait for him. 

With the help of a giant hamster, a knight, and the world’s magic, can Suho dig his new family out of debt and build a better future?

title: Apocalypse Sword God
summary:
If mercy and kindness can’t save the world, then this time, I choose to kill—

Eternal Slayer! Heavenly Lightning Slash! Sword of Annihilation! As long as you learn the most common sword skills, they can be upgraded to SSS rank?! Divine talent + forbidden skills! I’m the last spark of hope in this apocalypse!

title: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?
summary:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?

title: I Live with My Villain Uncle
summary:
A girl with foresight is sent to live with her cold, villainous uncle after her mother’s death.

Determined to save him from a dark future, she clings to him only to find roles reversed as he grows emotionally dependent. 

With a possessive childhood friend and a desperate father added to the chaos, her simple mission spirals out of control.

title: Melody of the Deadwood
summary:
On a continent protected by four witches stands Winfred Academy, a prestigious school of magic. When an incident occurs at the school, Anz finds himself right in the middle of it…  


---

title: The Cruelty of Salvation
I Possessed as an Extra in a Childcare Story
It Looks Like I’ve Fallen into the World of a Reverse Harem Game
summary:
Reset, and game set.

When I opened my eyes, I was in a different world. I had become the game's villainous princess who was feared by all. Not to mention… Completely naked men I didn't even know were approaching me left and right!

“Are you cold? Shall I warm you up with a hug?”

“Oh? Have you not had enough yet?”

Seriously, what’s up with this situation? And just how the hell am I going to get out of this freaking game?!

---
I woke up in a strange bed, with not just one, but two lovers beside me! In this game of love, affection, and deception, I’m Elvia, the Imperial Princess, with a gaggle of men vying for my favor. Sounds great, right? Except this means I'm also stuck as the villainess while the main character is my manipulative maid, Arielle! She’s out to bring me down, and she’s got plans for my harem of men. But I know all her secrets, because I can see her player notifications. Can I beat her at her own game?

---
**Original Novel:**
* Chapters: [Boomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Game_set), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52298103)

* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语 (R15)](https://www.podoteng.com/)
